nodes.text: The memorial staff was a type of decorated staff used by the Chiss species to commemorate the lives and accomplishments of prominent individuals. Memorial staves could be found at a Chiss family's homestead, where they were dedicated to deceased family members of glory and renown.

Memorial staves were a type of decorated staff used by the Chiss, a near-human species, to remember and celebrate the achievements of family members who had died. They were located at the family's homestead.

Memorial staves often honored Patriels, Syndics, Speakers, Patriarchs, and military officers of the family. The more important and powerful the Chiss memorialized, the larger and more grandiose their memorial staff would be. The memorial staves of civilian officials such as Patriarchs would be encircled by staves commemorating those they brought into or elevated within the family.

The Mitth family homestead, located underground on the Chiss homeworld of Csilla, had a mountain whose summit was adorned with memorial staves. Merit adoptives of the Mitth family performed their Trials at that homestead, the last of which was to climb that mountain. When merit adoptive Mitth'ali'astov performed her Trials in 19 BBY, Patriarch Mitth'oor'akiord observed her from the summit of that mountain, among the staffs. The Patriarch told Thalias that Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo of the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet would bring great glory to the Mitth family and that Thrawn's memorial staff would someday stand beside his own.
Memorial staves appeared in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising by Timothy Zahn.
